text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
What's up, Natsuha?

Look, Producer!
There's Cattleya over there!
Huh?

It's over there!
Let's go!

H-Hey...
That's the game corner──

Look, it really looks like Cattleya!
It's fluffy and so big!

...I see.
It's a crane game plushie.

I've decided.
I'm going to get this one.

Huh?
But, it's so big, you know?
Oh, the real Cattleya is a bit bigger, you know?

No, it's not that...
Isn't it really difficult to grab something that big?

Since it's a prize,
it doesn't mean it's impossible to get, right?
Well, yeah, I guess...

If that's the case, then I'll definitely get it!
Producer, teach me how to do it!

Ah, um...
Well, first you need to exchange some coins...

...Adjust the crane's center so it's directly
above the plushie's center of gravity──
──Here!

...Alright, I got it!
This time, for sure...

......!
I was so close...!
The arm's grip strength is just weak, huh...

But, I'm getting the hang of it little by little!
Let's go again!

...But...
that was perfect just now...

It's difficult...
If we couldn't get it with that one...
No, we're just getting started!

Indeed, it might not be straightforward,
but it's a fact that we're closer to the goal than before.

Just one more step...!
I'll definitely get it!

Up until now, I've been sticking to the orthodox method──
trying to grab the plushie directly from above...

...Maybe a different approach would be better...
The key is just to get it over the barrier at the goal.

...In that case, the crane's position is here!
Hook the arm onto the plushie's indent──and drop it!

We did it, Producer!
We finally got it!

Wow...!
That's amazing, Natsuha!

Hehe, yes!
Natsuha Arisugawa is amazing!

Once I decide to do something,
I'll definitely make it happen.

I believed we'd definitely get it this time!
You were with me, Producer.
Haha, very Natsuha-like.

──Well then, let's go soon.
Producer, could you hold onto this one?
